member.name: DWRITE_TEXT_METRICS
member.summary: Contains the metrics associated with text after layout. All coordinates are in device independent pixels (DIPs).

member.name: DWRITE_TEXT_METRICS.left
member.summary: A value that indicates the left-most point of formatted text relative to the layout box, while excluding any glyph overhang.

member.name: DWRITE_TEXT_METRICS.top
member.summary: A value that indicates the top-most point of formatted text relative to the layout box, while excluding any glyph overhang.

member.name: DWRITE_TEXT_METRICS.width
member.summary: A value that indicates the width of the formatted text, while ignoring trailing whitespace at the end of each line.

member.name: DWRITE_TEXT_METRICS.widthIncludingTrailingWhitespace
member.summary: The width of the formatted text, taking into account the trailing whitespace at the end of each line.

member.name: DWRITE_TEXT_METRICS.height
member.summary: The height of the formatted text. The height of an empty string is set to the same value as that of the default font.

member.name: DWRITE_TEXT_METRICS.layoutWidth
member.summary: The initial width given to the layout. It can be either larger or smaller than the text content width, depending on whether the text was wrapped.

member.name: DWRITE_TEXT_METRICS.layoutHeight
member.summary: Initial height given to the layout. Depending on the length of the text, it may be larger or smaller than the text content height.

member.name: DWRITE_TEXT_METRICS.maxBidiReorderingDepth
member.summary: The maximum reordering count of any line of text, used to calculate the most number of hit-testing boxes needed. If the layout has no bidirectional text, or no text at all, the minimum level is 1.
